name: Castle Battles (itch)
description:
Welcome to Castle Battles, a one or two player (local multiplayer) game where two castles fire cannonballs at each other! It was a lot of fun making this game and testing it with my friends, hope you like it!

The games controls are simple:

- Q for the left player to shoot

- P for the right player to shoot

If anybody beats "impossible" single player mode and can post proof, I will be quite impressed.

Have Fun!
